headline: Sysco Halts All Purchases from Fort Wayne, Ind. Facility that Supplied Frozen Shakes Linked to Listeria Outbreak and Recalls Related Products
summary: HOUSTON, Feb. 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Today, Sysco Corporation, the leading global foodservice distribution company, recalled frozen supplemental shakes linked to a Listeria monocytogenes outbreak and halted all purchases of other products supplied by Lyons Magnus from a Fort Wayne, Ind., facility. Lyons Magnus supplied Sysco Imperial and Lyons ReadyCare supplemental shakes linked to the outbreak. Sysco is immediately removing all the recalled items from its inventory, notifying potentially
